nodes.text: The Anq-Y enhanced optics suite was a model of enhanced optics suite available during the Galactic Civil War between the Alliance to Restore the Republic and the Galactic Empire following the Battle of Yavin. A type of armor enhancement added to the user's helmet, it increased the user's awareness of their surroundings through the inclusion of a number of sensors. The system was manufactured by Neuro-Saav Corporation and sold for  1750.

The Anq-Y enhanced optics suite was first mentioned in the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2013. The same information was also included in the Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook released the following year by Fantasy Flight Games.
